content: That's really interesting. I've been trying to establish a consistent wake-up time, and I think the Philips Wake-Up Light could really help with that. Since I've only been successful in waking up at 6:30 AM about 70% of the time, I think this device could help me become more consistent. Do you think it would be more effective if I used it in combination with my existing morning routine, which includes stretching and meditation?
